summary: A CASTLE ROCK ST225/75R15 SPARE TIRE TIRE THAT HAS NEVER BEEN USED EXPLODED WHILE STORED UNDER A BLACK WHEEL COVER ON THE BACK OF OUR 5TH WHEEL.  THE TRAILER IS LESS THAN 5 MONTHS OLD. THE COVER AND TIRE WERE IN DIRECT SUNLIGHT ON A 90 DEG F DAY AND WAS HOT TO THE TOUCH.  THE COVER WAS SHREDDED BY THE BLOWOUT. THE TIRE PRESSURE WAS CHECKED ABOUT 2 WEEKS EARLIER AND WAS OK.*DT  CONTACT HAS NOT CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURER.*JB
